benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

benefits.name: Escape Artist
effects: As a Bonus Action, you can take the Disengage action, which also ends the Grappled condition on you.

benefits.name: Quickness
effects: Your Speed increases by 30 feet.
